special_text:
When Siglar, Master Shipwright enters, you may create Kompmarr, a legendary 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact token. It has crew 2 and “Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of a Siglar planeswalker, this Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.”
[+1]: Target artifact you control gains indestructible and haste until end of turn.
[-2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature and Vehicle you control.
